name: Costume
desc: An costume desgined to enforce the wearer to be helpless and controled by the leash holder.
text: !User opens the box and finds a costume with belts, straps, locks, gag and a collar. The letter simple says "Come to the yiff club. Better be dressed when you arrive."

name: Pool suit
desc:
An latex goo that transforms its victim into rubbery pool toy.
Note: The wearer can't remove the suit by themselves.
text:
!User opens the box and finds a bottle with blue liquid in it. Opens it to smell it and smell odd.
As the pour a bit on their paws, it starts spreading, quickly.
Before they can ask for help, the substance covers them from head to toe in a rubbery skin, transforming them into a pool toy.

name: Reindeer suit
desc:
An squeaky rubbery goo that transforms its victim into rubbery reindeer toy.
Note: The wearer can't remove the suit by themselves.
text:
!User opens the box and finds collar with a jiggle bell on it.
The moment they put it on, a rubbery liquid starts covering up their entire body, transforming them into reindeer toys, helpless and ready to help anyone dressed up as Santa.

name: Jigle Jacket
desc: A festive straitjacket ready to show their spirit to give and to receive.
text:
!User opens the box and finds a straitjacket, not just any straitjacket but a festive one.
In the spirit of the holidays, they decide to wear them the entire night.
